advancements.acorigins.more_withers_kill: You really ain't got a hobby!
origin.acorigins.fire_lord.name: Lord of the Nether
origin.acorigins.fire_lord.description: The Lords of the Nether are descendents of the long dead kings of the nether. As such they are quite strong while in their kingdom, but when they leave it, they are like basic humans.
origin.acorigins.advanced_fire_lord.name: Lord of the Nether
origin.acorigins.advanced_fire_lord.desc: The Lords of the Nether are descendents of the long dead kings of the nether. As such they are quite strong while in their kingdom, but when they leave it, they are like basic humans.
origin.acorigins.evolved_fire_lord.name: Lord of the Nether
origin.acorigins.evolved_fire_lord.descr: The Lords of the Nether are descendents of the long dead kings of the nether. As such they are quite strong while in their kingdom, but when they leave it, they are like basic humans.
origin.acorigins.final_fire_lord.name: Lord of the Nether
origin.acorigins.final_fire_lord.descrip: The Lords of the Nether are descendents of the long dead kings of the nether. As such they are quite strong while in their kingdom, but when they leave it, they are like basic humans.
origin.acorigins.elemental_spirit.name: Elemental spirit
origin.acorigins.elemental_spirit.descri: You have mastered the elements and can use their powers.
power.acorigins.fire_aspect.name: Tactical fire
power.acorigins.fire_aspect.description: It's like fire aspect and flame while burning.
power.acorigins.flight.name: Flight
power.acorigins.flight.description: You can fly. Like, actually fly.
power.acorigins.furnace.name: Blazing fire
power.acorigins.furnace.description: You can use fire to smelt stuff.
power.acorigins.hellish_life.name: Hellish life
power.acorigins.hellish_life.description: Your max health slowly decreases while in the overworld, until you die.
power.acorigins.lava_water.name: Lavadynamic body
power.acorigins.wither_bonus.name: Withering insides
power.acorigins.wither_bonus.description: As your ancestors have mastered the withers, you can use their knowledge to gain stronger from killing withers.
power.acorigins.wither_inflict.name: Withering soul
power.acorigins.wither_inflict.descripti: You apply wither to anything you hit.
power.acorigins.elemental_fire.name: Fire form
power.acorigins.elemental_fire.descripti: While in your fire form, you are invulnerable to fire damage, deal extra damage while on fire, and get damage from water.
power.acorigins.elemental_water.name: Water form
power.acorigins.elemental_water.descript: While in your water form, you mine at normal speed under water, swim faster in water and get extra damage from fire.
power.acorigins.elemental_air.name: Air form
power.acorigins.elemental_air.descriptio: While in your air form, you are faster and you fall slower.
